fixes.name: check
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted the Tableau boolean comparison [fixed netting 3 R] > 0 to DAX, transforming the field reference to the 'TableName'[ColumnName] format. The expression returns TRUE when the aggregated calculated field 'fixed netting 3 R' is greater than 0.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The referenced field [fixed netting 3 R] is an aggregated/LOD-based calculated field (uses SUM and FIXED), so the computation is context/aggregate-based and must be implemented as a measure.
